{{{
Class("Point", {
	has: {
		x: {is: ro},
		y: {is: rw},
	},
	methods: {
		clear: function () {
			this.x = 0;
			this.setY(0);
		}
	}
})

Class("Point3D", {
	isa: Point,
	has: {
		z: {}
	},
	after: {
		clear: function () {
			this.z = 0;
		}
	}
})

var point = new Point3D();
}}}
